branchCategory.name: LEHZJ, Electric Gripper, 2-Finger Type with Dust Cover
branchCategory.description: The LEHZJ is constructed as an LEHZ with an added dust cover offering IP50 protection to the finger mechanism. This enhanced model is available in 4 sizes.
